NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
OENO: Daz, I have been enjoying using your voyager stones! It is much fun to explore and visit other planets with such ease.
2 1
OENO: However, there was a notable and strange experience I had, if you are able to illuminate its mystery!
3 2
OENO: Once, when Coleus was voyaging into the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> to reinforce its walls, instead of voyaging there, he was transported to Timber Hearth's surface - nowhere near the projection pool inside!
3 2
OENO: Furthermore, I began to experience strange.. visions from his voyage, despite him being the one using the voyager stone..
4 2
OENO: Could there have been some sort of mix-up with our memory statues while using the voyager stone? I would love if you could look into this incident sometime!
Workshop EX2 4
Workshop EX3 5
